2802.name: BANNED_ACCOUNT_ALL
2802.message:
This Nintendo Network ID
cannot be used.

Please make a note of the error code
and visit support.nintendo.com.
2802.short_description: Your account is permanently banned from all aspects of the network.
2802.long_description:
The account you are trying to use has been permanently banned from all aspects of the network. This includes, but is not limited to:

- Miiverse
- Game servers
- 3rd party services which opt-in to respecting network bans.
2802.short_solution: Appeal the ban on the forum.
